definitions.definition: To write under the name of another (especially literary works).
examples: Mariana would rather not ghostwrite for a living because she finds it a thankless task.

definitions.definition: To author a literary work or speech in the place of another.
examples: The president has someone to ghostwrite his addresses.

main_definition: ( authorship , intransitive ) To write under the name of another (especially literary works).
secondary_definitions: ( authorship , transitive ) To author a literary work or speech in the place of another.
